name: Turbo Trax (Arcane)
overview: You feel a sudden rush of adrenaline as the start flag is waved before you. Your foot slams down on the accelerator pedal and the sudden surge of power sends your indy car hurtling at breakneck speed down the track. This is the deciding race, this race will earn you the points needed for stage two of the championship, will you win or will you fail and crash 'n' burn? Turbo Trax is the ultimate in over-head racing game action. Experience arcade feeling and speed at it's best as you take your vehicle hurtling around the twenty-five tracks set in five very different and challenging environments. Take to the wheel of a 4 x 4 jeep, dune buggy, sports car, 4x4 truck or indy racing car - and hold on! Special Features: 1 or 2 players with Serial Link Option (Requires 2 Amigas) Super-Smooth Scrolling (50Hz) Fantastic 32 colour graphics Amazing stereo music, speech & sound effects Shop (for upgrading your vehivles performance) 5 Different vehicles with unique handling 5 Different terrains 4 Play modes
